meanings.definition: A unit of computing speed equal to one million floating-point operations per second.
meanings.sent1: The computer processed data at an impressive speed of several megaflops.
meanings.sent2: The new supercomputer boasts a processing power of over a million megaflops.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could think as fast as a megaflops when solving math problems!
meanings.sent4: Her brain was like a megaflops, swiftly calculating complex equations.
meanings.sent5: The megaflops of the machine hummed like a symphony of digital efficiency.

meanings.definition: The ability of a computer to perform one million floating-point operations per second.
meanings.sent1: The impressive megaflops of the computer allowed for lightning-fast calculations.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in a new server with high megaflops to improve performance.
meanings.sent3: The computer's megaflops were so powerful, it could solve equations in seconds!
meanings.sent4: His mind raced at megaflops speed, processing information at an incredible rate.
meanings.sent5: The megaflops of the computer were like a turbo boost for productivity.
